updates: - fix: Image selection error on Android
- add: user avatar display in server history and account switch.
- fix: invitation link and QR code issue.
- fix: unsent messages deletion issue.
- refactor: avatar data storage and fetching strategy.
- fix: HEIF image sending issue.
- fix: magic link parameter parsing issue.
- fix: messages might still appear when they are deleted.
- fix: gif image messages do not animate.
- fix: potential app stall when fetching user avatars.
- fix: disable auto-delete message for chats with user themselves.
- fix: some internationalization issues.
- fix: self-build preparation.
- fix: issue when doing registration with an app without login status.
- fix: license issue when sending files in private chats.
- fix: minor change in status monitoring strategy.
- fix: license issue in chat message sending.
- add: customizable url version.
- add: scan qr code to login.
- fix: token issues in registration process.
- fix: message deletion process.
- fix: network issue on previous versions.
- fix: multiple bug fixes and performance improvement.
- add: Push notification re-register page.
- fix: image sending status issue.
- refactor: image widget, support viewing all images in a chat.
- add: support to new server version with channel creation api change.
- fix: bugs related with FCM Push Notifications.
- fix: bugs related with auto-delete messages.
- fix: bugs related with auto-delete messages.
- add: auto-delete messages.
- fix: some simplified Chinese translation.
- add: simplified Chinese.
- add: improvement on message retrieving.
- add: invitation link QR code and scanning.
- add: potential error message output during login.
- fix: UI in auth pages.
- fix: http websites does not open in Android.
- fix: UI error after deleting account.
- fix: data interference between servers if data is being loaded.
- fix: disable mentions and solve cursor issue in DMs.
- fix: improve online state stability.
- fix: archive messages might stay in loading status.
- fix: minor issues in invitation link validation.
- add: check updates and changelog.
- fix: disable super admin (uid == 1) access to deleting their account.
- fix: some files do not open due to path and file name issues.
- fix: add channel list comparison when connection establishes, delete extra ones if necessary.
- fix: invitation link validation might output wrongly with localhost server deployment.
- fix: check invitation link validity before jumping to sign up page.
